basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Luis D. Montes Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry

description: This scholarship honors the former Chair of the Department of Chemistry, Dr. Luis Montes. This scholarship will provide assistance to students within the College of Mathematics and Science who are pursuing a degree in the Department of Chemistry. The recipient(s) of the Dr. Luis D. Montes Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry will be selected by the Chemistry Department Awards and Scholarship committee. The recipient(s) will be selected in the spring for distribution the following fall and spring semesters. Eligibility Requirements Complete application process online and attach an up-to-date transcript Student must demonstrate service within the department of Chemistry (ex. SI, research, lab assistant, etc.) Minimum 3.0 GPA Student must have one (1) faculty recommendation

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
